languages.text:
"Помешкать бы старому Волку, к врагу подступаясь,
Отважно терзал он могучего скверного зверя,
Но право порвать прогнившую нить его темного вюрда
Добудет себе молодой и умелый охотник!"

"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"
languages.original_text:
"Помешкать бы старому Волку, к врагу подступаясь,
Отважно терзал он могучего скверного зверя,
Но право порвать прогнившую нить его темного вюрда
Добудет себе молодой и умелый охотник!"

traits.locale_text:

against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

languages.text:
“然而，老狼的冲锋，
在敌人面前戛然而止。
他确实满怀英勇，
重创了腐化的恶兽。
然而，
斩杀猎物的权利，
属于另一位猎手！
年轻的猎人，
勇往直前！”
languages.original_text:
"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

traits.locale_text:
“然而，老狼的冲锋，
在敌人面前戛然而止。
他确实满怀英勇，
重创了腐化的恶兽。
然而，
斩杀猎物的权利，
属于另一位猎手！
年轻的猎人，
勇往直前！”

languages.text:
「だが老いた狼は未だ
敵を非難したまま。
力ある獣が腐敗するのを
実に勇ましく踏みにじる、
しかし腐った宿命の糸を
断ち切る権利は
もうひとりにあり…
生まれたてにして
勇敢に戦う狩人に！」
languages.original_text:
"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

traits.locale_text:
「だが老いた狼は未だ
敵を非難したまま。
力ある獣が腐敗するのを
実に勇ましく踏みにじる、
しかし腐った宿命の糸を
断ち切る権利は
もうひとりにあり…
生まれたてにして
勇敢に戦う狩人に！」

languages.text:
«Mas el ímpetu del viejo Lobo
contra el enemigo conectó.
La poderosa bestia de la corrupción
con gallardía él la aniquiló,
empero el derecho a cercenar
su podrido hilo del destino
lo reclamará otro:
¡un cazador joven
y audaz en batalla!».
languages.original_text:
"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

traits.locale_text:
«Mas el ímpetu del viejo Lobo
contra el enemigo conectó.
La poderosa bestia de la corrupción
con gallardía él la aniquiló,
empero el derecho a cercenar
su podrido hilo del destino
lo reclamará otro:
¡un cazador joven
y audaz en batalla!».

languages.text:
« Mais il est temps pour le vieux Loup
de cesser sa charge.
La puissante bête corrompue
qu'il a si vaillamment meurtrie,
un autre chasseur hardi
s'arrogera le droit d'occire,
et tranchera à son profit
le fil de son wyrd impie ! »
languages.original_text:
"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

traits.locale_text:
« Mais il est temps pour le vieux Loup
de cesser sa charge.
La puissante bête corrompue
qu'il a si vaillamment meurtrie,
un autre chasseur hardi
s'arrogera le droit d'occire,
et tranchera à son profit
le fil de son wyrd impie ! »

languages.text:
"Aufrecht griff der alte Wolf
den Gegner an.
Die mächtige Bestie der Verderbnis
warf er tapfer nieder,
doch das Recht, zu durchtrennen
ihren verfaulten Wyrd-Faden,
erhält ein anderer –
ein Jäger neu
und kampfesmutig!"
languages.original_text:
"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

traits.locale_text:
"Aufrecht griff der alte Wolf

Die mächtige Bestie der Verderbnis
warf er tapfer nieder,
doch das Recht, zu durchtrennen
ihren verfaulten Wyrd-Faden,
erhält ein anderer –
ein Jäger neu
und kampfesmutig!"

languages.text:
"Duruyor yaşlı Kurt'un
düşmana saldırısı.
Yozlaşmanın şanlı canavarını
yiğitçe kırıp geçti.
Fakat bu çürük kader ağını
koparma hakkı,
başkasının olacaktır:
Savaşta cesur,
yeni bir avcı!"
languages.original_text:
"But stay the old Wolf's charge
against the foe;
Corruption's mighty beast
he did valiantly ravage,
But the right to sever
its rotten wyrd-thread
will another claim—
a hunter fresh
and battle-bold!"

traits.locale_text:

düşmana saldırısı.

Savaşta cesur,
